idea:

Buy our products and become a part of the IronGang.

idea: PAYROOT FIN INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED is Mumbai based ‘Fintech’ start-up. We are a tech-driven company focusing on alternate payment technologies. By partnering with banks and financial institutions, we provide alternate banking solutions to hundreds of millions of Indians who are underbanked and who cannot resolve necessary banking services and government schemes. As a tech-driven company, we make use of our exceptional in-house technical team to implement state of the art technologies such as data analysis and machine learning to be one step ahead of our competitors.
name: PAYROOT FIN INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
INDENT INTERNATIONAL PVT LTD is one among the fast growing companies in Dental Industry. We array the widest range of Dental products to provide our customers & Doctor’s required for their organization, PAN India.

Our company is based in MUMBAI & was incorporated in the year 2019. We are leading manufacturers and traders of Dental Disposables & Consumables under our brand name “BLU”.

Our Company is Managed & Directed by Mr. Gaurav Arora & Mr. Karan Donga.

Disposable & Consumable Product Range:

• DISPOSABLE RANGE: Bite Blocks, Dispensing Guns, Micro Applicator Tips, Intra Oral Tips, Denture Box, Cotton rolls, Suction Tips, Fluoride Foam Impression Tray, Aspirator Surgical Tip, Autoclavable Bib Holder, Barrier Film, Heat Sealing Roll, Helios Drapes, Anti-Fog Glass, Protect Glass, Light Curing Glass, Mixing Tips, Cheek Retractor, Sterlisation Pouch, Autoclavable Dental Instrument Tray, Sterilization Pouch, Disposable Impression Tray, Burr Holder 24 Hole, Autoclavable Spatula, etc.

• CONSUMABLE RANGE: Blu CAL (Calcium Hydroxide Paste), Blu LUBE (EDTA Paste), Blu CAL+ (Calcium Hydroxide with lodoform), Blu O Seal (Resin Based Root Canal Sealer), Blu WASH (EDTA Liquid), Blu ETCH (Phosphoric Acid Etching Gel), Chloro Hypo 5.25% (Sodium Hypo Chlorite 5.25% (100ml), Fiber SPLINT, Blu Root Repair (Mineral Trioxide Aggregate (MTA), Blu Bio Seal (MTA Modified Resin Based Sealer).

We started with a dream to be the best in the Dental industry and for this reason we render our finest services to our customer. Our mission is to market products of high quality from Global leaders and make them available promptly at reasonable prices to the Dental practitioner.

Direct Personal Promotions:-

We have our own Marketing & Sales team who cover all the areas from Mumbai and visit all the Dental Practitioners and Dental Institutions at regular intervals to promote our products.

Indirect Promotions:-

Besides personal promotions, we market indirectly by advertising the focused products in leading Journals. We are always present in National and state conferences.

Values & Strengths:-

Our people have a strong desire to do the "right thing" and to deliver the promises that we make. We maintain very high levels of innovation, knowledge & technical expertise to deliver integrated solutions that work. We aim to build on the traditional Indian values of trustworthiness and to build strong partnerships with our customers and strategic partners.
name: INDENT INTERNATIONAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: AN EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY START UP FOCUSED ON BRIDGING THE GAP BETWEEN TUTORS AND STUDENTS BY PROVIDING A UNIVERSAL PLATFORM FOR EASE OF COMMUNICATION AND DISSEMINATION OF INFORMATION AND KNOWLEDGE
